name: df-fallfac
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cfallfac, cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cn0, cprod(s2, co(nat0, cfz, co(cv(s1), cmin, nat1)), co(cv(s0), cmin, cv(s2)))))
comment: Define the falling factorial function. This is the function ` ( A x. ( A - 1 ) x. ... ( A - N ) ) ` for complex ` A ` and nonnegative integers ` N ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 5-Jan-2018.)
